title: Repurpose an Article as a Video Script
description: A popular article is being turned into a short video. An editor needs to adapt the text into a script suitable for narration.

tasks.description: Retrieve the original article from the archive.
Rewrite the article in a more conversational tone, suitable for being spoken aloud.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, more conversational script is drafted.

tasks.description: Break the script into short segments and add visual cues for the video editor (e.g., '[B-roll of traffic]').
tasks.expected_outcome: The script is formatted for video production.
